context_of_use: This use case allows power users to execute batch operations to improve their efficiency in handling tasks.
stakeholders_and_interests: power user: improve efficiency in task handling
description: Provide power users the ability to execute batch operations to improve efficiency.
triggering_event: User initiates a request to perform bulk operations.
preconditions: User is logged into the system.
postconditions: System reflects the changes made by the bulk operations.
assumptions: The user has the necessary permissions to perform bulk operations.
The system is capable of processing bulk operations.
requirements_met: The system shall allow power users to perform bulk operations.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the types of bulk operations allowed.
main_flow: 1. User initiates a request to perform bulk operations → System displays available bulk operation options.
2. User selects the desired bulk operation → System processes the selection.
3. User confirms the bulk operation details → System executes the bulk operation.
4. System displays a success message and updated data.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 3): If the user cancels the operation, then the system aborts the bulk operation and returns to the previous state.
